title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item on initial attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt. Instead, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view. 

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the outline view.

Observed Behavior: The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view and the label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Expected Behavior: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt in the library outline view.
OB: The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view when trying to select any item for the first time.
EB: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt in the library outline view.
SR:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Try to select the label item in the outline view.
